achievements.title: Published Research Paper on Automated Visitor Scheduling System
achievements.short_description: Published a research paper on building an appointment system for BGC Trust University Bangladesh.
achievements.full_description: Successfully published my first research paper titled 'Streamlining Visitor Appointments: Automated Scheduling System for BGC Trust University Bangladesh' in the International Research Journal Of Modernization In Engineering Technology And Science (IRJMETS), Volume 05, Issue 09, September 2023.
achievements.how_achieved: Identified the inefficiencies in the manual visitor appointment process at the university and designed a fully automated web-based system. Developed and documented the system, followed by submission and review for publication.
achievements.words_about_it: This project marked a major milestone in my academic career. Publishing my first paper taught me a lot about research methodology, documentation, and real-world problem-solving with technology.

achievements.title: Certificate of Academic Excellence from Top-Ranked University
achievements.short_description: Recognized for contributing to BGC Trust University's rise to the No.1 university in Bangladesh (Scimago Ranking 2024).
achievements.full_description: Received a Certificate of Appreciation in March 2024 from BGC Trust University for outstanding research contributions, which played a significant role in the university's top national ranking.
achievements.how_achieved: My involvement in impactful research projects and successful publication helped elevate the academic standards of the university, contributing to its high Scimago Institutions Ranking.
achievements.words_about_it: Receiving this certificate was a proud moment. It reminds me that persistence in research and passion for innovation can create real impact, not just for me but for the entire institution I represent.
